text:
*"Hey everyone!* :wave:
I'm looking for a position as a *Web Designer/Developer*, preferably *remote and based in Germany*. I have *extensive experience with HubSpot, Figma*, and various *Adobe Suite* programs. Additionally, I have skills in *UI/UX design, responsive web development*, and modern *web technologies*.
If you know of any open positions or have recommendations, I’d love to hear from you! Let’s connect! :rocket:
Thanks a lot! :blush:"
